name: Offroad Oil Tanker Drive: Fun
description:
Are you ready to play oil tanker truck games ? If you are ready then let’s start drive of the extremely powerful engine to feel the thrill of off road driving and enjoy attractive hills climbing with your own oil tanker truck drive game 3d.

Features
Easy to play
Realistic HD graphics and HD truck sound
Multiple attractive levels
Off-road impossible tracks
Heavy duty oil tankers driving experience
Realistic gameplay control
Heavy transport duty
